name: @oriana/cdk
description: CDK Infrastructure for Oriana Order Tracking API

scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:ui
scripts.sam:start: sam local start-api -p 4000 -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers EAGER --skip-pull-image
scripts.dev: npm run synth:dev && npm run sam:start
scripts.dev:port: npm run synth:dev && npm run sam:start:port
scripts.dev:all: npm run synth:dev && concurrently -n "API,SAM" -c "cyan,magenta" "cd ../api && npm run watch" "node scripts/sam-start-watch.js"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.dev:debug: npm run synth:dev && sam local start-api -p 4000 -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers EAGER --skip-pull-image --debug
scripts.dev:quick: cdk synth ApiStack-dev && npm run sam:start
scripts.invoke:po: npm run synth:dev && sam local invoke poFunction -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --skip-pull-image
scripts.invoke:po:event: npm run synth:dev && sam local invoke poFunction -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json -e events/po-create.json
scripts.deploy:api:dev: npm run build:api && cdk deploy ApiStack-dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:api:qa: npm run build:api && cdk deploy ApiStack-qa --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:api:prod: npm run build:api && cdk deploy ApiStack-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:all && cdk deploy ApiStack-dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:qa: npm run build:all && cdk deploy ApiStack-qa --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:all && cdk deploy ApiStack-prod
